description: This course provides you with an introduction to prepare for and take the PMP exam. You will be introduced to basic terminology that will help you in the rest of our classes and that you can apply when taking your PMP exam. You learn about the PMP qualifications as well as information about the exam. We include engaging videos, interactions, along with worksheets to help you understand the more difficult concepts that you will see on the PMP exam.
title: Introduction to the PMP Certification Exam
